mapper.select: insert into lend (book_stock_id,emp_num,owner_emp_num,lend_date,return_due_date, regist_emp_num, update_emp_num, regist_time, update_time) values (#{bookStockId},#{empNum},#{ownerEmpNum},CURRENT_DATE(),#{returnDueDate},#{empNum}, #{empNum}, CURRENT_DATE() , CURRENT_DATE())
select * from lend where book_stock_id = #{bookStockId} limit 1

select * from lend as l join m_book_stock as mbs on mbs.book_stock_id = l.book_stock_id where l.book_stock_id = #{bookStockId} and (return_date is NULL or return_date is NOT NULL) order by return_date is NULL desc limit 1

select * from lend as l join m_book_stock as mbs on mbs.book_stock_id = l.book_stock_id join m_book as mb on mb.isbn = mbs.isbn where return_date is null and l.emp_num = #{empNum} order by mbs.book_stock_id
